cleaned_text: Our Treatments Acupuncture Acupuncture is a form of alternative medicine in which thin needles are inserted into the body. It is a key component of traditional Chinese medicine (TCM). TCM theory and practice are not based upon scientific knowledge, and acupuncture is a pseudoscience. [View Details](http://www.aurve.com/acupuncture) Meditation And Spiritual Awareness Meditation is a practice where an individual trains the mind or induces a mode of consciousness, either to realize some benefit or for the mind to simply acknowledge its content without becoming identified with that content, or as an end in itself. [View Details](http://www.aurve.com/meditation) Laser Treatment Cold Laser Therapy or Low Level Laser Therapy (LLLT) is a treatment that utilizes specific wavelengths of light to interact with tissue and is thought to help accelerate the healing process. [View Details](http://www.aurve.com/laser) Massage Therapy Neuromuscular Therapy Massage. Neuromuscular therapy is a form of soft tissue manipulation that aims to treat underlying causes of chronic pain involving the muscular and nervous systems. [View Details](http://www.aurve.com/massage) Ayurveda Ayurveda is the eternal Vedic science of life, the traditional natural healing system of India. The concept of Ayurveda is not just medical treatment or diagnosis of a diseased condition but much more than that. Ayurveda is a set of practical, simple guidelines, for long life and good health. [View Details](http://www.aurve.com/ayurveda) Chiropractor A chiropractor is a health care professional focused on the diagnosis andtreatment of neuromuscular disorders, with an emphasis on treatment through manual adjustment and/or manipulation of the spine.
